trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en sammansättning under text inkommande händelser i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a FrameworkTextComposition when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen är en FrameworkTextComposition när användaren anger text i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>med hjälp av en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] och <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FrameworkTextComposition is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkTextComposition är basklass för <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>klassen definierar egenskaper som returnerar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>objekt som anger positionen för text-sammansättning.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: När användaren anger text i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>är ett <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: Slutför sammansättning.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar längden på den aktuella sammansättningen i Unicode-tecken.

trans-unit.source: The CompositionLength property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CompositionLength anger hur många tecken har angetts sedan senast <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen är endast användbar när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, CompositionLength is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>händelse inträffar CompositionLength är-1, och <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>egenskapen anger längden på sammansättningen.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Längden på den aktuella sammansättningen i Unicode-tecken.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar positionen där sammansättning texten utförs i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen är endast användbar när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>händelse inträffar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A>är-1, och <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A>egenskapen anger textens position i sammansättningen.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionOffset introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Positionen där sammansättning texten utförs i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar längden för slutförda texten i Unicode symboler när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, ResultLength is –1.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>händelse inträffar ResultLength är-1.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultLength introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Längden på texten i Unicode slutförda symboler när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar förskjutningen för slutförda texten när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>händelse inträffar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>är-1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultOffset introducerades i .NET Framework version 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Förskjutningen för slutförda texten när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>
